name: EuclidTalk
_source: s;Euclid;Though it may not be expedient to say,|I honestly admire Morrissey.
s;Euclid;Not to, a-hem, insinuate treachery of course.|I am loyal.
s;Euclid;The scale of the gambit is impressive.|I mean, giving you food, shelter, protection.|Opportunity to train and recruit.|Just to try and sacrifice you now!|Quite the agenda, I think.
s;Simon;Do you really think he planned all this from the start?
s;Euclid;Maybe not. I may be overestimating him.|A fun hypothesis though, I think.
s;Simon;I don't think Anuki or I would agree with the "fun" part.|This could still be a misunderstanding.
s;Euclid;It isn't impossible. Merely deeply improbable.
